textContent:
- Weather affects the system (boosts or damages crops, for example). It can also have an effect on gameplay (water, sand, ice elementals can appear).
- Check if there's a function for checking weather values.
title: Overlord system
textContentHtml:
- Weather affects the system (boosts or damages crops, for example). It can also have an effect on gameplay (water, sand, ice elementals can appear).

- Check if there's a function for checking weather values.
